Title: Losing It
Plot: After arriving home, Tim starts to worry when he learns that Jenny has vanished. Bette travels to New York for an art opening and her relationship with Tina is put to the test. Back in Los Angeles, the sperm donor's girlfriend discovers a lonely Tina and starts to harass her.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Tina L. Klassen,  Peter Shinkoda,  Donna-Lea Ford,  Jo-Ann Fernandes,  Maria Louisa Figura,  Charlotte Chalmers,  Mark Oliver,  Nicole Oliver,  Heidi Iro,  Diana Pavlovska,  Audra Ricketts,  Robyn Ross,  Ivan Ce
